title: E-Learning Design for Complex Language Subjects: Web-Based Learning Simplification Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic language structures and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Supports language learning via simulations/VR in a BYOD environment, integrating diverse e-books and materials to facilitate step-by-step mastery of complex linguistic concepts.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex linguistic structures with over 80% accuracy through web-based interactive simulations
Successfully perform language-use scenarios reflecting cultural contexts in VR environments at least three times

Learners curate portfolios with 10 video lectures, 5 quizzes, and 3 practical assignments from e-learning platforms (Google Classroom, Khan Academy), then develop one software project (simple webpage/app prototype) over three weeks and submit results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
